company.name: Modern Talking Picture Service Inc.
company.address: 2323 New Hyde Park Road, New Hyde Park, NY 11040

questions.question: On a scale of 1 thru 10, please circle your group's reaction to the film.
Compared with other films on the same subject, how would you rate this film?
Was there any discussion of the film before or after showing?
Was the film introduced before the showing?
Can you estimate the average age of your group members?
If you recall, please name the sponsor of the film.
We would appreciate any general comments about the film.
We would appreciate any comments about our service.
